General.Name: Xianheng International Science & Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Xianheng International Science&Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, procurement, production, sale, and marketing of Maintenance, Repair, and Operation (MRO) products. It offers hand tools, electromechanical tools, electrical equipment, identification labels, emergency equipment and other tool products, electrical instruments and other instrumentation products, hydraulic special tools, cable intelligent detection equipment and systems, special vehicles, and construction machinery. The company also provides electrical equipment information collection and health status evaluation, maintenance of tools and instruments, emergency safety culture dissemination, testing, and other professional technical services. In addition, it operates Xianheng International Mall, an online e-commerce platform; and Safe City, offline chain service platform integrating MRO product display, experience and promotion, emergency culture dissemination, safety skills training, emergency material reserve linkage, and emergency information sharing. Further, the company provides power detection, safety training, and underground cavity detection services. It offers products and services for large-scale group enterprises and government departments in the fields of energy, transportation, emergency, etc. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

1.Name: Mr. Quan  Zou
1.Title: CFO & Sec. to the Board of Directors
